Comment: That's the whole point what these southern conservatives want.
Author: cursedwitheredcorpse

Comment: And amid this ruling, the White House pivots the Department of Justice's work fighting breaches of American civil rights. This law, and the DoJ team supporting it, has been working since the 1957 Civil Rights Act, but now, it's focused on [anti-Christian bias](https://www.cnn.com/2025/05/02/politics/trump-civil-rights-rollback-what-matters)  Interesting priorities.
Author: afuriousvexation

Comment: Conservatives everywhere want this. They want to bring us back to only rich, white, landowners being able to vote.
